description:

how to play:


-touch this button in image above to open seeds slots

-above is the hoe icon,touch it to use the hoe tool,jus touch soil 2 times to  hoe soil for preparing to plant.

this is the watering can,touch the planted soil to water it,you need to water your crops every day!

]

this is the hand icon,its used to harvest grown crops.use it touching a crop in its mature state.

sorry,i cant do something big because i use the free liscence of construct,when i buy the paid liscence i will do a better thing

without the full liscense i can put more crops(maybe 2 more)

the paid liscence is too expensive for this game,it dont deserve  :)
